europeana:record.dc:title: Freshwater Decapod Crustaceans from Pulau Tioman, West Malaysia
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Ng P.K.L.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Decapod Crustacea; Brachyura; Potamidae; Stoliczia (Johora); Natantia; Macrobrachium; Caridina; descriptions; new species; new records; Pulau Tioman
europeana:record.dc:description: Two new freshwater crabs, Stoliczia (Johora) punicea spec. nov. and S. (J.) tiomanensis counsilmani subspec. nov., are described from streams in Pulau Tioman, West Malaysia. Taxonomic notes are added of S (J.) tiomanensis tiomanensis Ng & Tan, 1984. New records of the carideans Macrobrachium pilimanus (De Man, 1879) and Caridina typus H. Milne Edwards, 1834, are presented for the island.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Freshwater Decapod Crustaceans from Pulau Tioman, West Malaysia (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 59) (Issue 14)
